definition: to use (two words etc) together/to use (sth) continuously
to link/to join/to connect/continuously/in succession/including/(used with 也[ye3], 都[dou1] etc) even/company (military)
to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore

sentences.english: We use ' have' with a plural pronoun or noun.
sentences.chinese: 与复数代名词或名词连用。

sentences.english: Collective nouns are used with singular verbs.
sentences.chinese: 集合名词与单数动词连用。

sentences.english: Count nouns can be used with numbers.
sentences.chinese: 可数名词可与数字连用。

sentences.english: The forth part, Co-occurrence and Collocation.
You use negative words with modals to make negative clauses.
sentences.chinese: 情态动词与否定词连用可构成否定句。

sentences.english: The word"worth"can be construed with a gerund in active voice.
sentences.chinese: 一词可与主动语态的动名语连用。

sentences.english: Singular subjects go with singular verbs .
sentences.chinese: 单数主语与单数动词连用。

sentences.english: Of particular importance, should be taken once a double insurance 2.
sentences.chinese: 特别重要的，还应采取两只连用双保险。

sentences.english: Singular nouns are used only in the singular, always with a determiner.
sentences.chinese: 单数名词只有单数形式，总是与限定词连用。

sentences.english: You can also use "there" with modals.
Used with present participle to make progressive form.
sentences.chinese: 与现在分词连用，做进行式。

sentences.english: Plural subjects go with plural verbs .
sentences.chinese: 复数主语与复数动词连用。

sentences.english: Used with past participle to form passive voice.
sentences.chinese: 与过去分词连用，成被动态。

definition: to take medicine orally (as opposed to applying externally)
to take medicine orally/oral (contraceptive etc)/to say that one is convinced
